Package de.espirit.firstspirit.access

Interface Host

  • public interface Host
    Generic host definition.
    Since:
    4.1.10

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Connection getConnection()
      Return the Connection
      Language getGuiLanguage()
      Returns the language which should be used for GUI rendering (e.g. tree labels)
      Project getProject()
      Shortcut for getUserService().getProject() and returns null if no project is selected.
      ResourceBundle getResourceBundle()
      Return the ResourceBundle for the host.
      UserService getUserService()
      Return the UserService
      boolean showUidAsTreeLabel()
      Indicates whether the uid should be used as tree label or not.
